# The `MipsMCInstLower` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipsmcinstlower">MipsMCInstLower</a> - This class is used to lower an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> into an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>
